summary: My retexture of Steel Fullplate + Steel Greatsword
descriptionHtml:
My retexture of Steel Fullplate + Steel Greatsword

Blackened - I really like steel plate armor and Greatsword model, however I wanted to give it
	    a littlebit more unique/powerfull look. This is the result :)

!! male and female version !!

!! simply extract to your data folder!!

!! how to uninstall: delete /data/textures/armor/nordplate                  !!
!!			    /data/textures/weapons/steel/steelcalymore.dds  !!

Credits: Bethesda for making original textures
            Me (Plzaxbb) for fiddling with it

Enjoy ;)
author: PLZAXBB
